directions: Blend strawberries, coconut water, ice, rum, sugar, and vanilla extract together in a blender until frozen and slushy.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh strawberries, hulled and halved
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers rum, or more to taste
1 tablespoon white sugar, or more to taste
title: Strawberry Slushy (Smoothie) with a Kick
